###  1

```javascript
}

  myName: '',
  callName: callName,
}

```

`this`  `this`  `family`  `this.myName` 

---

###  2

```javascript
var myName = ''
function callName() {
  console.log(this, this.myName)
}

var family = {
  myName: '',
  callName: callName,
  ana: {
    myName: '',
    callName: callName,
  },
}
family.callName()
family.ana.callName()
```

![](https://i.imgur.com/FB2N78p.png)
 `family`  `ana` 
 `family.callName()`  1 
 `family.ana.callName()` `callName()` this  `ana` 

---

###  3

```javascript
var myName = ''

function callName() {
  console.log(this, this.myName)
}

var family = {
  myName: '',
  callName: function () {
    console.log(this, this.myName)
  },
}

// family.callName();
var callName = family.callName
callName()
```

![](https://i.imgur.com/YMU8nGg.png)
 `family.callName()`  1  `callName`  `` ?
`callName`  this  `family`  `window`  `window`  `myName`  ``

```javascript
uploadImg() {
    //  fileUpLoading  true
  this.status.fileUpLoading =  true
  const uploadFile = this.$refs.files.files[0]
  const formData = new FormData()
  formData.append('file-to-upload', uploadFile)

      this.status.fileUpLoading = false
      if (res.data.success) {
        // this.tempProduct.imgUrl = res.data.imageUrl
        console.log(this.tempProduct)
        this.$set(this.tempProduct, 'imgUrl', res.data.imageUrl)
      }
    })
}
```

DOM ```javascript const musicContainer = document.querySelector('#music-container') const progressContainer = document.querySelector('#progress-container') const progress = document.querySelector('#progress') const audio = document.querySelector('#audio') const cover = document.querySelector('#cover') const PrevBtn = document.querySelector('#prev') const playBtn = document.querySelector('#play') const nextBtn = document.querySelector('#next') const title = document.querySelector('#title') ``` ### 2. ```javascript const songs = ['hey', 'summer', 'ukulele'] let songsIndex = 2 loadSong(songs[songsIndex]) function loadSong(song) { title.innerText = song audio.src = `music/${song}.mp3` cover.src = `images/${song}.jpg` } ``` ### 3. `callback function` `musicContainer` DOM `classList play` `icon` `icon` `icon` ```javascript function playSong() { musicContainer.classList.add('play') playBtn.querySelector('i.fas').classList.remove('fa-play') playBtn.querySelector('i.fas').classList.add('fa-pause') audio.play() } function pauseSong() { musicContainer.classList.remove('play') playBtn.querySelector('i.fas').classList.add('fa-play') playBtn.querySelector('i.fas').classList.remove('fa-pause') audio.pause() } playBtn.addEventListener('click', () => { const isPlaying = musicContainer.classList.contains('play') if (isPlaying) { pauseSong() } else { playSong() } }) ``` ### 4. 0 0 #### `songs.length - 1` 3 2 `3 - 1` 2 #### ( ) 0 ```javascript function preSong() { songsIndex-- if (songsIndex < 0) { songsIndex = songs.length - 1 } loadSong(songs[songsIndex]) playSong() } function nextSong() { songsIndex++ if (songsIndex > songs.length - 1) { songsIndex = 0 } loadSong(songs[songsIndex]) playSong() } PrevBtn.addEventListener('click', preSong) nextBtn.addEventListener('click', nextSong) ``` ### 5. `updateProgress` function function progress bar - `timeupdate` : - `e.srcElement` `console.log` ![](https://i.imgur.com/u1ixS8l.png) - `duration` : - `currentTime` : ![](https://i.imgur.com/ulsD1u7.png) `progress` bar ```javascript function updateProgress(e) { const { duration, currentTime } = e.srcElement const progressPercent = (currentTime / duration) * 100 progress.style.width = `${progressPercent}%` } audio.addEventListener('timeupdate', updateProgress) ``` ### 6. progress bar bar `clientWidth` : `clientWidth` `progress` ![](https://i.imgur.com/W6jadN3.png) `console.log` `clientWidth``clickX` ![](https://i.imgur.com/jL6oaR9.png) bar bar `offset` `clint` : ![](https://i.imgur.com/WFOOzc5.png) [](https://www.pianshen.com/images/124/09a28ef42af91b0b7d5fff6c74bd3a0c.png) ```javascript function setProgress(e) { const width = this.clientWidth const clickX = e.offsetX const duration = audio.duration audio.currentTime = (clickX / width) * duration } progressContainer.addEventListener('click', setProgress) ``` --- ## [CSS ](https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-TW/docs/Web/CSS/CSS_Animations/Using_CSS_animations) [ CSS ( CSS Animation )](https://www.oxxostudio.tw/articles/201803/css-animation.html) [Animate.css](https://animate.style/) [HTMLMediaElementtimeupdate](https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/API/HTMLMediaElement/timeupdate_event) [20 Web Projects With Vanilla JavaScript](https://www.udemy.com/course/web-projects-with-vanilla-javascript/learn/lecture/17842308#overview)

[vue-loading-overlay](https://github.com/ankurk91/vue-loading-overlay)
 npm: `npm install vue-loading-overlay` 
 main.js 
<!--more-->

```javascript
// Import component
import Loading from 'vue-loading-overlay';
// Import stylesheet
import 'vue-loading-overlay/dist/vue-loading.css';

//  component  Vue.component
Vue.component('Loading', Loading)
```
![](https://i.imgur.com/NxbUi4i.png)

---
## Loading
 components 
 lading  ` isLoading: false,`

![](https://i.imgur.com/cLak0kf.png)

 

div  `<loading :active.sync="isLoading"></loading>`

![](https://i.imgur.com/kX4o8Kv.png)

 AJAX  ` isLoading: false,`
 `getProducts`  loading ( true )( false )
:
```javascript
getProducts() {
  const api = `${process.env.APIPATH}/api/${process.env.MYPATH}/products`
  this.isLoading = true
  this.$http.get(api).then((response) => {
    this.products = response.data.products
    this.isLoading = false
  })
},
```

 Loading 
 Loading 

!!

 loading 


![](https://i.imgur.com/SKEI2vd.png)

 CDN  [font-awesome](https://cdnjs.com/libraries/font-awesome)  index.html

![](https://i.imgur.com/fszYHjw.png)
![](https://i.imgur.com/jBEiM1M.png)

 [Animating Icons](https://fontawesome.com/how-to-use/on-the-web/styling/animating-icons)  loading 
 `fa-spinner fa-spin` 
 laoding  `fa-spinner fa-spin`  label 

![](https://i.imgur.com/t3XKdnP.png)

 data  loading 

![](https://i.imgur.com/oQk38Gg.png)

 v-if 

![](https://i.imgur.com/doiggrR.png)

( uploadImg ) loading 

```javascript
uploadImg() {
    //  fileUpLoading  true
  this.status.fileUpLoading =  true
  const uploadFile = this.$refs.files.files[0]
  const formData = new FormData()
  formData.append('file-to-upload', uploadFile)
  //
  const url = `${process.env.APIPATH}/api/${process.env.MYPATH}/admin/upload`
  this.$http
    .post(url, formData, {
      headers: {
        'Content-Type': 'multipart/form-data'
      }
    })
    .then((res) => {
      console.log(res.data)
      // AJAX  fileUpLoading  false
      this.status.fileUpLoading = false
      if (res.data.success) {
        // this.tempProduct.imgUrl = res.data.imageUrl
        console.log(this.tempProduct)
        this.$set(this.tempProduct, 'imgUrl', res.data.imageUrl)
      }
    })
```
```javascript
}
```

---

## var 

> var = variable 

 `var` 

```javascript

console.log(name)
```

 `name` 
![](https://i.imgur.com/edspqWp.png)

 ?
(  let  )

```javascript
var name = 'ken'

{
  var name = 'kevin'
}

console.log(name)
```

 `window.name`  `name` 
![](https://i.imgur.com/ifNVCZs.png)



 `var`  ( `window` )  `var`  `function` 

###  function  var 

#### 1.  var

 `function`  `var`  `function`  `console.log` 

```javascript
;(function () {
  var functionName = 'kevin'

})()

console.log('' + functionName)
```


![](https://i.imgur.com/duOiXIj.png)

 `window.functionName`  `undefined` `var`  `function` 
![](https://i.imgur.com/gCTG8qA.png)

#### 2.  var

```javascript
;(function () {
  var functionName = 'kevin'
  console.log(' function  ' + functionName)
})()

var functionName = 'ken'
console.log('' + functionName)
```

![](https://i.imgur.com/NNGSXL9.png)
 `var`

'0' + hours : hours minutesEL.innerHTML = minutes < 10 ? '0' + minutes : minutes secondsEl.innerHTML = seconds < 10 ? '0' + seconds : seconds } // getTime() setInterval(getTime, 1000) ``` ### 5. loading loading loading ```javascript setTimeout(() => { loading.remove() countdown.style.display = 'flex' }, 1000) ``` ## [JavaScript Date getFullYear()](https://www.fooish.com/javascript/date/getFullYear.html) [CSS ( before after )](https://www.oxxostudio.tw/articles/201706/pseudo-element-1.html) [ JavaScript: Day 06 ](https://ithelp.ithome.com.tw/articles/10191180)

DOM ```javascript const draggableList = document.querySelector('#draggable-list') const checkBtn = document.querySelector('#check-btn') const attractions = [ '', ' - ', '', ' ', '', '', '()', '', '', '', ] let dragStartIndex const listItems = [] ``` ### 2. DOM > ( Spread Operator ) : > > ( ) > ( Rest Operator ) : > ( ) ( , Rest parameters ) > > : [](https://eyesofkids.gitbooks.io/javascript-start-from-es6/content/part4/rest_spread.html) `setAttribute( 'data-', 'value ')` : `data-` `console` ![](https://i.imgur.com/tx1LA4c.png) `number` `string` ```javascript // listItem.setAttribute('data-id', 'dataId') listItem.setAttribute('data-name', 'dataName') ``` ![](https://i.imgur.com/DuEqPBg.png) **** `forEach` `setAttribute` `ul` ```javascript creatListItem() function creatListItem() { ;[...attractions].forEach((person, index) => { const listItem = document.createElement('li') listItem.setAttribute('data-Index', index) //className name value listItem.innerHTML = ` ${index + 1}

    ${person}

    ` listItems.push(listItem) draggableList.appendChild(listItem) }) addEventListeners() } ``` ### 3. map : value `Math.random()` sort ```javascript ;[...attractions].map((a) => ({ value: a, sort: Math.random() })) ``` ![](https://i.imgur.com/asWCFfa.png) - ` sort()` : [Codepen](https://codepen.io/gleofgja/pen/LYbNwoE?editors=0011) ```javascript // sort const numbers = [1, 3, 9, 6, 20, 15] console.log( numbers.sort(function (a, b) { return a - b }) ) // arrow function console.log(numbers.sort((a, b) => a - b)) ``` ![](https://i.imgur.com/rRpF2i2.png) ```javascript ;[...attractions].sort((a, b) => a.sort - b.sort) ``` ![](https://i.imgur.com/WRDnx5f.png) value ```javascript .map((a) => a.value) ``` ### 4. : [HTML5 Drag and Drop API ](https://hff2.github.io/2021/02/02/HTML5-Drag-and-Drop-API-%E7%AD%86%E8%A8%98/) | | Drag Source | Drag Target | | | -------- | -------- | -------- |-------- | | 1 | dragstart| |****| | 2 | drag | dragenter || | 3 | | dragover |****| | 4 | | dragleave |****| | 5 | | drop |********| | 6 | dropend | |****| > : [HTML5 Drag and Drop API](https://pjchender.blogspot.com/2017/08/html5-drag-and-drop-api.html) > ![](https://i.imgur.com/BoqFTzM.png) > > - **Drag Source** element > - **Drop Target** div container > - **drag** drag source > - **dragover** drag source drop target ```javascript function addEventListeners() { const draggables = document.querySelectorAll('.draggable') const dragListItems = document.querySelectorAll('.draggable-list li') // ul li ( li calssName ) draggables.forEach((draggable) => { draggable.addEventListener('dragstart', dragStart) }) dragListItems.forEach((item) => { item.addEventListener('dragover', dragOver) item.addEventListener('drop', dragDrag) item.addEventListener('dragenter', dragEnter) item.addEventListener('dragleave', dragLeave) }) } ``` ```javascript function dragEnter() { // console.log('Event: ', 'dragEnter') this.classList.add('over') } function dragLeave() { // console.log('Event: ', 'dragLeave') this.classList.remove('over') } ``` `dragstart` ```javascript function dragStart() { // console.log('Event: ', 'dragStart') // dragStartIndex = +this.closest('li').getAttribute('data-Index') //+ // console.log(dragStartIndex) // console.log(typeof dragStartIndex) } ``` `+` `console` ![](https://i.imgur.com/lQOGwH6.png) `+` ![](https://i.imgur.com/ZTQX984.png) ```javascript function dragDrag() { // console.log('Event: ', 'dragDrag') const dragEndIndex = +this.getAttribute('data-Index') swapItems(dragStartIndex, dragEndIndex) this.classList.remove('over') } function swapItems(from, to) { const itemOne = listItems[from].querySelector('.draggable') const itemTwo = listItems[to].querySelector('.draggable') listItems[from].appendChild(itemTwo) listItems[to].appendChild(itemOne) } ``` ### 5. ```javascript function checkOrder() { listItems.forEach((listItem, index) => { const personName = listItem.querySelector('.draggable').innerText.trim() if (personName !== attractions[index]) { listItem.classList.add('wrong') } else { listItem.classList.remove('wrong') listItem.classList.add('right') } }) } checkBtn.addEventListener('click', checkOrder) ``` ## ##  Hoisting

 `a` 
```javascript
var a = 10 //+
console.log(a) //10
```

![](https://i.imgur.com/2rDOBI6.png)


?
```javascript
console.log(a)
var a = 10 //undefined
```
 `undefined` 
![](https://i.imgur.com/A2qvpOc.png)


?

 JavaScript  ( Hoisting )
```javascript
//
var a //
console.log(a) //undefined
a = 10 //
```
![](https://i.imgur.com/ez0GKJ0.png)

`undefined`  `undefined`

``  `` 
```javascript
a = 10 //
console.log(a) //10
var a //
```
![](https://i.imgur.com/Nbyz9Jk.png)

?

 JavaScript  ( Hoisting )
```javascript
//
var a //
a = 10 //
console.log(a) //10
```
![](https://i.imgur.com/FoJvksj.png)



[DEMO](https://codepen.io/gleofgja/pen/dyNMGrm?editors=0012)

##  Hoisting


### 1. 

```javascript
function fn(){ //
  console.log('Hello') //Hello
}

fn() //
```
![](https://i.imgur.com/WUlijrL.png)



 `fn()` ?
```javascript
fn()
function fn(){
  console.log('Hello') //Hello
}
```
![](https://i.imgur.com/irTTtSx.png)

?
 JavaScript Hoisting 

### 2. 
********?
```javascript
fn()
var fn = function(){
  console.log('Hello') // fn is not a function 
}
```
![](https://i.imgur.com/QbarxaO.png)

 `fn is not a function` 
```javascript
var fn 
fn()
fn = function(){
  console.log('Hello') // fn is not a function 
}
```
![](https://i.imgur.com/WW7URJz.png)

---

```javascript
var fn // var a

fn() // console.log(a)

fn = function(){        // a = 10
  console.log('Hello') 
}
```


[DEMO](https://codepen.io/gleofgja/pen/zYNqrXZ?editors=0012)
